ResearchProjectDef.label: blight studies
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study the fundamentals of the Blight infection and begin developing countermeasures. Allows extraction of blight slime from zombie corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic blight treatment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop basic herbal treatments for the Blight infection. Allows creation of Blight Resistant Additive and Herbal Blight Cleanse Serum.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced blight treatment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further refinement of Blight infection treatments using industrial components. Allows creation of Industrial Blight Cleanse Serum.

ResearchProjectDef.label: glitterworld blight treatment
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize advanced glitterworld medical technology to create a powerful cure for the Blight infection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic blight weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Develop specialized weapons designed to effectively combat Blight zombies.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced blight weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create more sophisticated weapons that can efficiently eliminate Blight zombies and prevent further infection.
